channel.title: [PI] Dungeoneering point system
channel.description:
Okay i added in dung at player and playersave .java but in my charater file it saves as
[code]Dung-tokens 0[/code] instead of [code]Arma-KC=15[/code] and if i edit my charater file to lets say [code]dung-tokens 5000[/code] and log out it will reset it back to 0. how do i make it stay where it is?
Then lets say i kill an npc, how do i reward points for killing that npc?

item.title: [PI] Dungeoneering point system
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

@ the last comment , you would do it the same way as if you was killing a npc tip: check out npchandler and how it gives slayer points.

Read full topic
